description: The snippet object contains basic details about the stream, including its channel, title, and description.

channelId.description: The ID that YouTube uses to uniquely identify the channel that is transmitting the stream.

description.description: The stream's description. The value cannot be longer than 10000 characters.

publishedAt.description: The date and time that the stream was created.

title.description: The stream's title. The value must be between 1 and 128 characters long.
